articles.author: Richard Snow
articles.title: Markets Week Ahead: Gold, US Dollar, Euro, Pound Sterling - DailyFX
articles.description: This week sees crucial US inflation (CPI) data alongside deliberations from the European Central Bank on monetary policy. FOMC minutes may already be out of date
articles.content: The week ahead presents many high importance risk events ranging from US CPI data to central bank decisions in Canada, New Zealand and the European Union. The FOMC minutes of the March meeting will a… [+3069 chars]
